title: I have 1 million points on Caitlyn, i just wanted to say I love the new skin @ whoever made it
body: But she has way too many voice lines happening. Me going from base to bot tower i heard like 7 sentences. Its way too clumped and if someone could please lower that im sure many people have the same complaint with some of these legendary skins.

replies.body: Word. I'll turn down frequency for her VO lines. Thanks for the heads up!

While you are at it, can you remove the frequency of Taric saying "even an aspect needs help now and again."  I play him jungle and sometimes get {{item:2032}} .  If I use all 5 stacks at once, he will say his line 5 times in a row and it gets really annoying.

> [{quoted}](name=AlienPrimate,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=griuvzUK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-27T23:09:24.876+0000)
>
> While you are at it, can you remove the frequency of Taric saying "even an aspect needs help now and again."  I play him jungle and sometimes get {{item:2032}} .  If I use all 5 stacks at once, he will say his line 5 times in a row and it gets really annoying.

Heeeeelllll yeah I can totally make that happen. Thanks for the heads up on it :D

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=griuvzUK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-27T22:50:54.677+0000)
>
> Word. I'll turn down frequency for her VO lines. Thanks for the heads up!

Thank you<3
At least she doesn't repeat them too often from my experience. For some reason whenever I play Kayn he will use the same voice line twice in a row and it happens pretty frequently lol.
Reminds me of poppy "not like this"
I don't have this complaint with DJ Sona xD
